text:
Well no answer from HubSpot yet - i tried running a simple "get associated ID listing" for quotes on the docuemtnation website which gave me a success in the private app log - but then again, when i run the code in the workflow i also get a "success" message, but when it reaches the basicAPI for quote part it fails.
So yea still waiting for an update from HubSpot on this :smile:
